screenshot.caption: FUW file open in tildearrow Furnace 0.6

description: Furnace is a program that creates 8-bit music for old sound chips and video game consoles. Retro gaming and audio enthusiasts typically use the software.

The audio tracker includes a Wavetable editor to visually modify a waveform to adjust the sound. To open the Wavetable editor, select window â†’ assets and click wavetables to enable the Wavetables window. You can click the floppy disk save icon in the window to save the wavetable in the FUW file.
